# From the Bluetooth Mesh Profile Specification v1.0.
#
# The relevant AES-CCM calls are:
#
# KEY: EncryptionKey
# NONCE: Network Nonce
# IN: DST || TransportPDU
# AD: (none)
# CT: EncTransportPDU
# TAG: NetMIC
#
# KEY: DevKey if present, otherwise AppKey
# NONCE: Application Nonce
# IN: Access Payload
# AD: Label UUID, if present
# CT: EncAccessPayload
# TAG: TransMIC
